titleStmt.title: The crafty maid's approbation: wherein she shews with black or brown; 'tis mony makes them straight go down; when pretty girls that gold has none, their fortune is still to lie alone.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for W.O. A.M. and sold by C. Bates, at the Bible and Sun in Pye-corner.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Draw near to me young girls to side ..."
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
